Theta = -32.5
Phi = -22.5
r_A = 1.375
r_B = 1.5
z_0 = 5

z_1Ax_0 = z_0 - (tan(Theta / 2) * r_A)
        = z_0 - (-0.40077595193087040069368326205599)
        = 5.400775951930870400693683262056

z_1Bx_0 = z_0 + (tan(Theta / 2) * r_B)
        = z_0 + (-0.4372101293791313462112908313338)
        = 4.5627898706208686537887091686662

z_1Ax_1 = z_0 - (tan(Theta / 2) * -r_A)
        = z_0 - (0.40077595193087040069368326205599)
        = 4.599224048069129599306316737944

z_1Bx_1 = z_0 + (tan(Theta / 2) * -r_B)
        = z_0 + (0.4372101293791313462112908313338)
        = 5.4372101293791313462112908313338


z_1Ay_0 = z_0 - (tan(Phi / 2) * r_A)
        = z_0 - (-0.27350450514702975950344673113643)
        = 5.2735045051470297595034467311364

z_1By_0 = z_0 + (tan(Phi / 2) * r_B)
        = z_0 + (-0.29836855106948701036739643396701)
        = 4.701631448930512989632603566033

z_1Ay_1 = z_0 - (tan(Phi / 2) * -r_A)
        = z_0 - (0.27350450514702975950344673113643)
        = 4.7264954948529702404965532688636

z_1By_1 = z_0 + (tan(Phi / 2) * -r_B)
        = z_0 + (0.29836855106948701036739643396701)
        = 5.298368551069487010367396433967
